description: Number of dominoes with n spots (in standard set).
links: Index entries for sequences related to dominoes
example: a(3)=2 since there are two dominoes with three spots: 2,1 and 3,0.
crossrefs: Cf. A008967 where rows are equivalent sequences for zero to n spots in each half-domino (in this standard case: 6)
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Aug 23 2000
